Package controllers

Interface ClientAware

All Known Implementing Classes:
AvailabilityController, ConnectController, CreateNewOrderViewController, EditSubscriberDetailsController, ExtendParkingController, GuestMainController, GuestMainLayoutController, LoginController, MainController, ModeSelectionController, ParkingReportController, ParkingReservationSummaryController, RegisterSubscriberController, StaffMainController, StaffMainLayoutController, SubscriberMainController, SubscriberMainLayoutController, SubscriberStatusController, TerminalMainLayoutController, VehicleDeliveryController, VehiclePickupController, ViewActiveParkingInfoController, ViewActiveParkingsController, ViewParkingHistoryController, ViewSubscriberDetailsController, ViewSubscribersInfoController, WatchAndCancelOrdersController
public interface ClientAware
Interface for JavaFX controllers that need access to the ClientController. Classes that implement this interface will receive the ClientController during screen loading and can use it to communicate with the server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    setClient(ClientController client)
    Injects the active ClientController instance into the implementing class.

  • Method Details

    • setClient

      void setClient(ClientController client)
      Injects the active ClientController instance into the implementing class.
      Parameters:
      client - the client controller used for communication with the server
